job_description:
1. Editing & Proofreading: Review and edit copy to ensure accuracy, clarity, and adherence to brand guidelines
2. Brand Alignment: Ensure that all copy aligns with the brand's tone, voice, and messaging strategy
3. Research: Can observe and conduct self-research to understand the target audience and market trends, informing and enhancing the quality of the copy
4. Feedback Integration: Actively participate in generating creative campaigns and copy with the Marketing & Partnership team
5. Collaboration: Engage in cross-functional collaboration with designers, marketing, and partnerships to ensure that all copy materials align with project goals and needs
6. Stay Current: Stay updated on industry trends and best practices in copywriting and campaigns, and share valuable insights and findings with the team
7. Learning and Development: Proactively seek opportunities for skill development and learning, leveraging mentorship and training programs within the organization
